content.user_title: Create unique algorithmic art with code
content.value_statement: Transform your creative ideas into beautiful generative art using code. This skill creates original algorithmic artworks with seeded randomness for reproducible results and interactive parameter controls for endless exploration.
actual_capabilities: Creates original algorithmic philosophies and manifestos for generative art movements
Generates interactive HTML artifacts with p5.js algorithms and parameter controls
Implements seeded randomness for reproducible artwork generation
Builds particle systems, flow fields, and emergent behavior algorithms
Provides real-time parameter adjustment with immediate visual feedback
limitations: Requires understanding of generative art concepts for best results
Art output depends on algorithmic philosophy quality and implementation
Limited to 2D visualizations using p5.js canvas rendering

use_cases.title: Create unique generative artworks
use_cases.description: Design custom algorithmic art pieces with controlled randomness and interactive exploration for galleries or personal collections.

use_cases.title: Prototype generative algorithms
use_cases.description: Rapidly prototype and iterate on creative coding concepts with seeded reproducibility and parameter tuning.

use_cases.title: Teach computational aesthetics
use_cases.description: Demonstrate algorithmic art principles, emergent behavior, and the intersection of code and creativity.

prompt_templates.title: Flow field particles
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an algorithmic art piece using flow fields and particle systems. Make particles follow Perlin noise vectors with organic movement patterns.

prompt_templates.title: Recursive branching
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a recursive branching algorithm that creates organic tree-like structures with randomized angles and self-similar patterns.

prompt_templates.title: Wave interference
prompt_templates.prompt: Create particle systems that exhibit wave-like interference patterns using sine functions and phase relationships.

prompt_templates.title: Crystalline packing
prompt_templates.prompt: Implement a circle packing or Voronoi tessellation algorithm that evolves through relaxation to create crystalline structures.

output_examples.input: Create a flow field visualization with organic particle movement
output: Interactive HTML artifact with 5000 particles following Perlin noise flow fields
Real-time parameter controls for particle count, flow speed, noise scale, and trail length
Color palette selector with three customizable colors
Self-contained file that runs instantly in any browser

best_practices: Focus on algorithmic philosophy first - define the computational aesthetic before coding
Use seeded randomness consistently for reproducible results across sessions
Design meaningful parameters that explore the algorithm's creative space effectively
anti_patterns: Don't copy existing artists' work - create original algorithms to avoid copyright issues
Avoid random RGB colors - use thoughtful color palettes and relationships
Don't treat this as a pattern library - each piece should express a unique algorithmic vision

faq.question: Is this compatible with all browsers?
faq.answer: Yes, the HTML artifacts use standard p5.js from CDN and work in all modern browsers without setup.

faq.question: What are the limits on particle count or complexity?
faq.answer: Performance depends on your device. Start with 1000-5000 particles and adjust based on smoothness.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with other creative tools?
faq.answer: The output is standard HTML/JavaScript - embed in websites, convert to video, or use as creative reference.

faq.question: Is my artwork data safe?
faq.answer: All generation happens locally in your browser. No data is sent to external servers.

faq.question: The art looks different than expected - how do I troubleshoot?
faq.answer: Check parameter values, try different seeds, and ensure your browser supports WebGL if using advanced features.

faq.question: How does this compare to other generative art tools?
faq.answer: This creates fully self-contained artifacts with interactive controls, unlike static generators or complex IDEs.
